title: Starbound 2月2日更新日志：人员控制
author: 王奕磊WYL
txt_content:
本帖最后由 王奕磊WYL 于 2016-2-3 09:57 编辑 

Hey everyone!嘿,大家好!
It’s been a little difficult to find things to show off on the blog lately that aren’t massive mission spoilers, but today I’ve got something pretty cool! :)这有一点困难去找一些不是大规模的剧透的东西展示在博客上，但今天，我有些很酷的东西。
When you establish a colony and befriend a colonist by completing tasks for them, they may ask if they can join your ship’s crew! If you accept them into your crew, they’ll wear a Protectorate uniform and beam up to your ship. When your crew is large enough you’ll receive a ship upgrade license.当你建立一个殖民地并且通过完成任务来帮助殖民者,他们就可能会问，他们是否可以加入你的飞船？如果你接受他们当你的船员,他们会穿着摄政制服（我也不清楚是什么）,传送到你的飞船。当你的船员足够多时,你会收到一条飞船升级许可证。


Alternatively, if you’d like to avoid the colony system altogether, you can spend a bunch of pixels at the Penguin Bay for a shady fake upgrade license.另外,如果你想要完全避免殖民系统,你可以花一堆的像素在企鹅湾买到假升级许可证。
YouTube视频：http://www.youtube.com/embed/AW2YqfMaG5E?feature=oembed
